1. Simulation

Simulation of read counts using negative binomial distribution and preforming AIPS sorting and selecting cells. The effective sgRNA are selectd from a pool of sgRNA targeting genes. The number of True positive, FP rate and sample size are predetermined.

class AIPyS.AIPS_simulate.Simulate(df, lookupString='PEX', tpRatio=10, n=3, p=0.1)[source]
